# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Electricity distribution structure at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt structure at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to avoid interruptions in production.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network to generate power.
- Verify that all entities requiring power are properly connected to the electric network.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a sufficient supply of source items to operate.
- Regularly check the inventory of source items to avoid interruptions in production.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network.
- Verify that all entities requiring power are properly connected to the electric network.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient supply of fluids to operate.
- Regularly check the fluid status of pipe groups to avoid interruptions in production.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have a sufficient supply of ingredients to operate.
- Regularly check the inventory of ingredients to avoid interruptions in production.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
